title: AAM Launch Plans And Challenges Are Coming Into Sharper Focus | Aviation Week Network
text: AAM Launch Plans And Challenges Are Coming Into Sharper Focus [Garrett Reim](/author/Garrett-Reim) [Angus Batey](/author/angus-batey) [Ben Goldstein](/author/Ben-Goldstein) [Graham Warwick](/author/graham-warwick)June 28, 2024 Leaders in the development of electric air taxis have unveiled details of their plans to launch services, but whether paying passengers will fly first in the U.S. or another market remains unclear. Archer Aviation and Joby Aviation both aim to certify their electric vertical-takeoff-and-landing... AAM Launch Plans And Challenges Are Coming Into Sharper Focus is available to both Aviation Week & Space Technology and AWIN subscribers.
